name: Blood Rite of the Dice King
name_original: Blood Rite of the Dice King
description:
In a grimy chamber, you roll the dice for life and death.
Can you overcome the pentagram?

The Blood Rite of the Dice King is a claustrophobic first-person experience about dice luck, despair and accession to the throne.

Credits

Design, Art & Code
Alexander Leps aka DctrElectro

Music & SoundFX
Alex Hamadey

Made for the Themed Horror Game Jam #11 "A game of life and death".
Play the windows build for best experience.
